definition: to cast/to send/to throw oneself (into the river etc)/to seek refuge/to place oneself into the hands of

sentences.english: Another major investor in the movie is a company in Zhejiang Province.
sentences.chinese: 影片的另一个主要投资人是浙江的一家公司。

sentences.english: The unlucky investors hang out together and drown their sorrows in a few drinks.
sentences.chinese: 一些歹运的投资人聚在一起藉酒浇愁。

sentences.english: Allegedly outstanding investor Lei Jun once fuddle one's cap is celebrated 3 days with showing.
sentences.chinese: 据说卓越的投资人雷军曾经大醉三天以示庆祝。

sentences.english: Joe Cole was one of the few who got out in time.
sentences.chinese: 乔科尔是及少数及时逃出房产泡沫的投资人之一。

sentences.english: The clear message that they might keep only half of the profit from their ideas daunted inventors.
sentences.chinese: 投资人由于只能从其创新中获得一半利润而感到气馁。

sentences.english: Each of the Investors and the Company reserves the right to amend terms.
sentences.chinese: 投资人及公司均保留修订条款的权利。
投资人理所应当地拔腿逃跑。

sentences.english: The next day investors queued up to buy Freddie's bonds.
sentences.chinese: 翌日，投资人排起长龙，争购房地美的债券。

sentences.english: This group of serial entrepreneurs and investors represents a new generation of wealth and power.
sentences.chinese: 这一拨创业者，投资人代表的是新一代财富和权力。

sentences.english: This is how I believe angel investors should think.
sentences.chinese: 我认为天使投资人是应该这样思考的。

sentences.english: Richard's bank offers a class on how to become a successful investor.
sentences.chinese: 理查的银行开了一堂如何成为成功投资人的课。

sentences.english: The U. S. economy is spooking investors.
sentences.chinese: 美国经济让投资人胆颤心惊。

sentences.english: This provision is meant to protect investors in the event of a down round.
sentences.chinese: 这个条款是为了在估值较低的一轮融资中保护投资人。

sentences.english: So what's a Chesapeake Energy investor to do?
sentences.chinese: 那么作为切萨皮克能源公司的投资人又有什么辄儿？

sentences.english: NO08,4. I am an aggressive investor, so I am willing to take some risks.
sentences.chinese: 我是个积极的投资人，所以我愿意冒一点风险。

sentences.english: Value investors look for securities with prices that are unjustifiably low based on their intrinsic worth.
sentences.chinese: 价值投资人寻找价格低于其内在价值的股票。

definition: the owners of a private enterprise/management/capital (as opposed to labor)
private equity fund/fund offered to private placement (e.g. hedge fund)
